name: International Society for P4 Medicine
goal: The goal of the International Society of P4 Medicine is to facilitate the change towards a preventive, predictive, personalized and participatory health care model, - Michael Sagner M.D.
interests: Education and training, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Sport
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020 health care, public health, biotech, systems medicine and preventive medicine initiatives.
